hero.name: Gabriel Ivan Setyaputra
hero.title: Software Engineer
hero.bio: 🚀 Passionate Software Engineer who transforms ideas into reality! Expert in Flutter, React.js, and cutting-edge web/mobile development. Delivered game-changing solutions that boosted user engagement by 155% and reduced operational costs at Grab.

about.title: About Me
about.description: 💡 I'm a code craftsman and digital architect with 3+ years of turning complex challenges into elegant solutions! My superpower? Creating stunning mobile and web experiences with Flutter, React.js, and full-stack magic. I don't just write code—I engineer user delight and build systems that scale! 🎨✨

education.title: Education
education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Informatics Engineering

roles.title: Mobile Engineer - Flutter (Mex App)
achievements: 💥 Improved user feedback response rates from 79% to 91% and engagement from 11.5% to 29.4%
⚡ Optimized server load and reduced costs by integrating Mex AI Assistant via WebView
🚀 Boosted engagement through dynamic content rendering with JSON SDUI
🏆 Completed 'Meal For One Insights Phase 1' as Top 40 Project at Grab

roles.title: Software Engineer - Web (Mex Onboarding)
achievements: 💪 Saved ~900 monthly man-hours by enhancing dynamic translation features
🎨 Developed Progressive Onboarding UI/UX components covering 80% of workflows
⚡ Streamlined onboarding process with universal base components

roles.title: Software Engineer - Web & Flutter (POS)
achievements: 💰 Reduced deployment time and saved RM 300-500 in setup fees with QR scanning
🎯 Led design system creation and upgraded Flutter to v3.3.10 for UI consistency
📉 Reduced support tickets by 53+ % with diagnostic tool development
🚀 Built lead generation landing page improving conversion rates

roles.title: Full-Stack Developer
achievements: Built a comprehensive CRM system that transformed client relationships
Leveraged the mighty MERN Stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) for maximum impact
Implemented bulletproof authentication and smart data management solutions

contact.title: 🚀 Let's Create Something Amazing
contact.description: Ready to turn your wildest tech dreams into reality? I'm always excited to dive into groundbreaking projects and explore thrilling opportunities. Don't hesitate—let's make magic happen! ✨
